question: Who has edited the book "The Way I See It: A Gauri Lankesh Reader"?
explanation: The book \"The Way I See It: A Gauri Lankesh Reader\" has been edited by writer and sociologist Chandan Gowda. The book containing selected writings by late journalist Gauri Lankesh was launched at the Mumbai Press Club on 22nd December 2017, three months after she was gunned down outside her home in Bengaluru by unidentified men.
